subtasks: Planting seedlings in carefully spaced furrows
Harvesting ripe watermelons using precise methods

tasks.task: Farming watermelons - from seed to harvest (maybe a broad task that covers seed selection, planting, nurturing, and initial processing)
Each of these could be MAINTASKs with their subtasks. Let me see.
Managing watermelon farming operations on a large scale (130,000 acres)
Farming watermelons - from seed to harvest
Innovating and expanding the US watermelon industry
Farming watermelons - from seed to harvest
subtasks: Selecting the best watermelon seeds, preparing soil and furrows with machinery, planting seedlings, watering and fertilizing throughout growth, closely monitoring for signs of ripeness, using precise methods to harvest (like tossing melons into trucks), transporting fruits to processing facilities.
Conducting quality checks on harvested melons, packaging them, and shipping both domestically and internationally.
Continuously researching new watermelon varieties, adopting sustainable agricultural techniques, and expanding market presence globally.
